text: Amhi taurata avatarita keli, jyata margadarsana ani nura (divya prakasa) ahe. Yahudi lokammadhye yaca tauratadvare allahala mananare paigambara ani allahavale ani dharmajnani loka phaisala karita asata karana tyanna allahacya ya granthace raksana karanyaca adesa dila gela hota ani te yavara svikaranare saksi hote. Ata tumhi lokance bhaya balagu naka, kimbahuna majhe bhaya balaga. Majhya ayatinna thodyasa kimmativara viku naka ani jo, allahane avatarita kelelya sandesa (vahayi) cya adharavara phaisala na karila tara ase loka purepura kaphira aheta
